name: Traffic Rider Racer 3D: Reverse Highway Car Driver
name_original: Traffic Rider Racer 3D: Reverse Highway Car Driver
description:
◉ In Car Highway Traffic Racer ◉

Are you ready to go as fast as possible?

Come now and download this racing game. Race from inside of the car. Realistic physics and graphics. Drive through highway traffic in revers style. Go as far as you can to win more cash, and be able to upgrade and buy new fast cars.

Best in car racing game but now going backwards in a high-speed road.

Drive from the inside of the vehicle and have an excellent experience.


◉ Real Fast Race ◉

Main Features

- Incredible 3D Graphics
- A Lot of Cars To Buy And Up-Great
- Smooth Controls
- Cool Sounds Effects
- Addictive Game Play
- All Cars Are Customizable

Do you think you can manage to drive from the inside of the car?

Show your skills and download this racing game now!!

Give us a Review for Free :)
